com.bandyer.core_av.audiosession

Class AudioSessionOptions

  • com.bandyer.core_av.audiosession.AudioSessionOptions

  • public class AudioSessionOptions

    Class which represents options to be used to initialize audio session module. By default the AudioSession automatically changes between earpiece -> speaker-phone -> wired-headset -> bluetooth devices in this exact order and priority when connected. The proximity sensor is optionally used to automatically switch between earpiece(near) and speaker(far)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AudioSessionOptions.Builder
      AudioSessionOptions Builder class used to specify audio session options
